name: Edelweiss: A Kaiserreich Visual Novel
description:
Edelweiss is a visual novel/dating sim set in the Kaiserreich universe. Following one of six main characters on their journey to Switzerland to receive an international education from the International University of Geneva, your character will meet ten primary characters representing the ten ideological categories present in Kaiserreich, as well as a variety of other side characters. Finding yourself in between the French and German powderkeg, will you be able to plant your roots and blossom in a land far from home?

Meet Gwen, Suraj, Ophelie, Sabine, Nikolay, Victoria, Caterina, Erika, Yuki, and Jose as well as explore the foundations of the Edelweiss story. Play through the first three days of Edelweiss, with many branching paths that allow you to find something new upon replaying.

Join our subreddit and our Discord to keep updated on future progress reports, Edelweiss news, and future position openings, in case you want to be a part of the project.

Our subreddit: http://reddit.com/r/KRDSdev

Our Discord: https://discord.gg/ZpdzcAK
